Text saved: NASA wants to find the other medium-sized NEOs, which are space rocks. But to do this, it needs money to build a special telescope called NEOCam. This telescope is 0.5 metres wide, and it would use infrared light – a type of light we cannot see – to find these asteroids. If NASA gets the money, it could probably find all of them in ten years. However, after these asteroids are found and recorded, the team that protects Earth would still need to decide how to protect our planet from the really dangerous ones, which are called PHAs.
